body: Now I realized that this code can lead to a segfault I think, because the function we return doesn't own `this`, which is needed by `name()`. Can you just capture it by value?
body_html: Now I realized that this code can lead to a segfault I think, because the function we return doesn't own this, which is needed by name(). Can you just capture it by value?
